name: FateChessboard
description:
This may be a Roguelike card game experience unlike any you've encountered before, combining innovative combat mechanics with inspiration drawn from established gameplay. In this game, you'll need to apply wit and strategy to continually build your own deck of cards, engage in battles against formidable foes, and emerge victorious.

Game Features:
  • All the skills you have and the monsters in the map are hidden in each tile. You need to maximize the discovery of skills and use them to attack monsters. How to find skills, judge where monsters are, when to use skills, and when to reveal monsters are all tests of your strategy.


  • A large number of skills and relics, challenging monsters and bosses. Every start is completely programmatic random generation, making your experience completely different every time.
